text:
I have created a form module, snippet attached. How do I access the fields to customize and validate the form with regex? Does anyone have any examples?
``` <div class="formulario">
  {% form
	form_to_use="{{ module.form_ad.form_id }}"
	response_response_type="{{ module.form_ad.response_type }}"
	response_message="{{ module.form_ad.message }}"
	response_redirect_id="{{ module.form_ad.redirect_id }}"
	response_redirect_url="{{module.form_ad.redirect_url}}"
	gotowebinar_webinar_key="{{ module.form_ad.gotowebinar_webinar_key }}"
%}
</div>```
